articles.title: China defends handling of rocket debris, accuses America of double standards - ABC News
articles.description: China says it closely tracked the trajectory of its Long March 5B rocket booster and points to Western media using "romantic rhetoric" about recent SpaceX debris as evidence it is being unfairly held to different standards than the US.
